Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 7 wickets (with 105 balls remaining)
Fakhar Zaman hit 81 off 74 in his comeback game, smashing seven sixes and three fours
Shaheen Shah Afridi and Haris Rauf started the slide for Bangladesh
Mehidy Hasan Miraz removed Pakistan's top three
Bangladesh were flattened by the Pakistan bowlers and then by the two openers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan have now played seven matches at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata, and won six of them
Pakistan have kept their hopes of a semi-finals spot alive with this seven-wicket victory
Only thrice in their history have Pakistan successfully chased a World Cup game with more deliveries remaning
Others: The match was played at Eden Gardens, Kolkata
The match was the 31st of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-10-31
The match was a day-night game
